museum_name.value: Colorado Snowsports Museum and Hall of Fame

notes.value: Open daily 10am–6pm; free admission. Mission emphasizes celebrating Colorado snow sports through stories that educate and inspire adventure. Site lists exhibits, hall of fame, events, and a digital collection.

raw_response.summary_short: Free-admission museum in Vail celebrating Colorado snow sports through exhibits, a Hall of Fame, events, and a digital collection.
raw_response.summary_long: The Colorado Snowsports Museum and Hall of Fame in Vail focuses on Colorado snow sports, presenting stories intended to educate and inspire visitors to seek adventure. The website highlights core offerings including exhibits, a Hall of Fame section, events programming, and a digital collection. It is open daily (10am–6pm) and advertises free admission, making it an easy add-on for a half-day visit in Vail.

collection_highlights.title: Exhibits on Colorado snow sports
collection_highlights.description: On-site exhibits centered on Colorado snow sports history and culture.

collection_highlights.title: Hall of Fame
collection_highlights.description: Hall of Fame component recognizing notable figures in snowsports.

collection_highlights.title: Digital Collection
collection_highlights.description: Online-accessible digital collection extending the museum experience beyond the galleries.

visitor_tips: Plan a half-day visit to cover exhibits plus any scheduled events.
Take advantage of free admission for a flexible drop-in visit.
Check the events calendar (e.g., Vail history tours, yoga at the museum) to align your visit with programming.
Explore the digital collection before or after your visit for added context.
raw_response.best_for: Visitors interested in Colorado snowsports history and culture; travelers seeking a free, educational stop in Vail.
raw_response.curatorial_approach: Story-driven interpretation of Colorado snow sports designed to educate and inspire adventure.
